targets.expr: sum by (id, name, type) (pve_guest_info{instance="$instance"})

sum by (id) (
  # 模板部分
  (pve_guest_info{template="1", instance="$instance"} * 0 - 1)
  or
  # 非模板部分  
  (pve_up{instance="$instance"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info{template!="1"})
)
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_limit{instance="$instance"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance",template!="1"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_disk_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_disk_size_bytes and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info{type="lxc"})
pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="$instance"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="$instance"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_cpu_usage_limit and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} and on(id) pve_node_info
((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="$instance"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
(pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_memory_size_bytes * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance", id=~"storage/.+"} / pve_disk_size_bytes * on (id, instance) group_left(storage) pve_storage_info
pve_disk_size_bytes{instance="$instance", id=~"storage/.+"} * on (id, instance) group_left(storage) pve_storage_info
pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_disk_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} * on (id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info{type="lxc"}
(rate(pve_network_receive_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
(rate(pve_network_transmit_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m])* on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
((rate(pve_disk_write_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m]) + rate(pve_disk_read_bytes[5m])) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

panels.description: Current swap memory usage on the host
panels.title: Host Swap Usage

targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu") FROM "cpustat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpustat" WITH KEY = "host"
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpustat" WITH KEY = "host"
